const iField_TensorHandle  tensor_handle,
int *  coord_type,
int *  err 
)

What type of coordinate system is used for physical coordinates?

Parameters:
instance  [in] iField instance handle
tensor_handle  [in] Tensor handle to act on.

err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

char *  name,

Retrieve name for this tensor.

Parameters:

err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
name_len  [out] Length of name string.

const iField_TensorHandle  tensor_handle,
iField_TensorTemplateHandle *  template_handle,
int *  err 
)

Retrieve tensor template for this tensor.

Restriction: tensor_handle must not be a compound field.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iField instance handle
tensor_handle  [in] Tensor handle to act on.
template_handle  [in] Tensor template handle for this tensor.
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
